entry.title: Check Out the Whitespace Theme README
entry.content:
This is the Themespace default demo blog of the Whitespace theme (for Octopress). This first post is a link post. Click the title to navigate to the theme’s GitHub repository – where you can also find links to real blogs using slightly customized versions of Whitespace.

All the posts below are randomly generated text and code to illustrate the theme’s appearance.
